install.name: fboxbot
install.author: Guessous Mehdi Imed
install.description: The bot will detect any image resized in your editor, and will automatically create the corresponding thumbnail. For advanced use, just read further the page were you've downloaded the plugin. Warning !: The bot is not applied to images external to your joomla site.

param.name: resize_method
param.label: Method for resizing
param.description: Recent distributions of PHP come pre-packaged with GD - if you're not sure what you have, set this option to GD2.

param.name: jpg_qual
param.label: Jpeg Quality
param.description:
All thumbnails are made in jpeg.
Values can range from 0 (worst) to 100 (best).
By default: 80.

Do not change this setting unless you really know what you're doing.

param.name: rebuild_button
param.label: Rebuild button
param.description:
Rebuild thumbnails button
Only for (Super) Administrators.

param.name: auto_next_prev
param.label: Auto next/previous
param.description: Will automatically add next/previous action for all image popus in same article, unless behavior overriden.

param.name: force_caption
param.label: Force caption bar
param.description:
You can close image popups, by just clicking on the image. So if the close link is the only option to display on the popup's caption bar, then the frontbox script just doesn't display the caption bar by default.

You can force the caption bar to be always displayed, by setting this option to Yes.
By default: No

param.name: fb_threshold_percent
param.label: Frontbox Threshold %
param.description:
How much bigger than the thumbnail must be the source image, in order to add a frontbox popup ?

Example: if you define a threshold of 20%, then the original image must be at least 20% bigger than the thumbnail; otherwise we don't use popup.

Enter a value between 0 & 100.
By default: 20

param.name: watermark
param.label: Watermark, Png File
param.description:
In order to makes visitors aware, that clicking on some thumbnails, opens a popup, the bot apply a dedicated watermark.
Must be a png.
If the file doesn't exist or the string is invalid, then watermark is disabled.

Please indicate path from the fboxbot folder.
Default watermark: magnify.png

Remark: You can use a transparent watermark. Works well with 24 bits png and GD2.

param.name: wtmk_threshold_percent
param.label: Wtmk Threshold %
param.description:
How much bigger than the watermark image, the thumbnail must be, in order to apply the watermark to the thumbnail ?
Enter a value between -100 & 900.
By default: 200

Negative values are accepted. This means that the watermark will be cropped.

Example: if you define a threshold of 200%, then the thumbnail image must have at least, width and height that are three times the width and height of watermark image.

param.name: wtmk_pos_x_percent
param.label: Wtmk Position X %
param.description:
If you want your watermark,
to be at the extreme left of the thumbnail, then set it to 0; if you want it in the horizontal middle, then set it to 50 etc ...

Enter a value between 0 & 100.
By default: 100

param.name: wtmk_pos_y_percent
param.label: Wtmk Position Y %
param.description:
If you want your watermark,
to be at the extreme top of the thumbnail, then set it to 0; if you want it in the vertical middle, then set it to 50 etc ...

Enter a value between 0 & 100.
By default: 100
